# network.r2d3

network.r2d3 makes interactive network charts in D3 leveraging
[r2d3](https://rstudio.github.io/r2d3/)

It is intended to closely follow the functionality of
[networkD3](https://christophergandrud.github.io/networkD3/), but with
the following benefits:

1.  leverage the benefits of `r2d3` versus including a version of D3
    internally
2.  use a better, more consistent API based on current standards in
    tidyverse
3.  use transparent converters to enable easy usage of numerous data
    input types
4.  use a testing infrastructure to aid in development

## Installation

You can install the dev version of network.r2d3 with:

``` r
pak::pak("cjyetman/network.r2d3")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`as_force_data()`](as_force_data.md) : Convert one of numerous data
  types to force_network's 'native' data format

- [`as_sankey_data()`](as_sankey_data.md) : Convert one of numerous data
  types to sankey_network's 'native' data format

- [`as_tree_data()`](as_tree_data.md) : Convert one of numerous data
  types to tree_network's 'native' treenetdf form

- [`force_explorer()`](force_explorer.md) :

  Interactive `force_network` options explorer

- [`force_network()`](force_network.md) : Create an interactive force
  network plot in a htmlwidget

- [`sankey_explorer()`](sankey_explorer.md) :

  Interactive `sankey_network` options explorer

- [`sankey_network()`](sankey_network.md) : Create an interactive sankey
  network plot in a htmlwidget

- [`save_as_png()`](save_as_png.md) : Save a PNG screenshot of a
  htmlwidget

- [`save_as_svg()`](save_as_svg.md) : Save a SVG screenshot of a
  htmlwidget

- [`tree_explorer()`](tree_explorer.md) :

  Interactive `tree_network` options explorer

- [`tree_network()`](tree_network.md) : Create an interactive tree
  network plot in an htmlwidget
